name: Everette “Belted Hip Pouch”
description:
The perfect accessory for the hands-free shopper. The “Everette” Belted Hip Pouch is denim matched with a butter soft white leather closure flap wrapped by a matching sequined buckled belt. With 100% paisley silk lining, this playful little purse attaches to your belt to be worn on the hip.  Also available in other colors.

	Dimensions: Width: 6” Length: 5 ¾”, bottom width around: 16”

name: Everette “Tortoise Shell Chain Shoulder Bag”
description:
Epitomizing style and femininity, the Everette “Tortoise Shell Chain” Shoulder Bag has a deep blue denim foundation partnered with a butter soft cocoa-colored calf’s skin leather lapel and thick beige and brown tortoise shell chain handle. It’s accented with a leather side piece and back pocket leather flaps enhanced with vibrant brass buckles. The olive and brown printed lining and brass zipper closure give this purse that extra pop.

	Dimensions: W: 14 ½ “ L: 8”

name: Everette “Faded Denim & Leather 4 Ring Clutch
description:
For that fashionista who commands attention, Everette’s Faded Denim and Leather Clutch with exaggerated lapel includes 4 silver grommets that gives it that style and flair. Matched with stone-washed denim with decorative leather accent added to the bottom of the bag for that extra funky effect. The inside linings’ bold plum and white print boasts useful compartments for a cell phone and other accessories. The boldness is completed with leather ringed attachments added to the back pockets.

	Dimensions: W: 13” L: 9”

name: Everette “ Oversized Mocha Denim Clutch”
description:
Oversized is the key word.. Everette’s Oversized Mocha-Colored Denim Clutch is the perfect accessory to take you from an afternoon lunch to the lounge.. Partnered with a dark brown and white check print lining with zipper closure, the Mocha colored oversized lapel is styled with a large pewter loop that pulls the whole look together.

	Dimensions: W: 19” L: 9 ½”

name: Everette “ Brass Chain Denim Leather & Suede Clutch”
description:
Like your bags with a little hardware flair? Well check out Everette’s Brass Chain Denim Leather & Suede Clutch. A denim base paired with a sexy dark brown lapel. This lapel is uniquely turned up to showcase its burgundy suede underside. The multi-colored pinstripe lining gives this purse an air of sophistication while the brass chain accent and the purse’s slight asymmetrical shape gives it a little edginess.

	Dimensions: W:15 ¾” L: 7
